name: Graffiti Wars
description: Graffiti Wars is a 3D isometric team-based party game where two groups of Artists go at war with each other by spraying the opponent’s side of the playground. In a 2 v 2 party, there will be one painter and one cleaner for each side. Painters must paint as much walls as possible, and cleaners need to stop Painters from generating points, by stunning or erasing the graffiti. Fight for control over the schoolyard in this chaotic and fast-paced multiplayer adventure.
